docs.snippet: Pope Francis has appointed a bishop to the Diocese of Kansas City-St. Joseph in Missouri, permanently replacing a cleric who was convicted of failing to report a suspected child abuser....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pope Francis has appointed a bishop to the Diocese of Kansas City-St. Joseph in Missouri, permanently replacing a cleric who was convicted of failing to report a suspected child abuser.

headline.main: Replacement Named for US Bishop Who Didn't Report Abuse
headline.print_headline: Replacement Named for US Bishop Who Didn't Report Abuse

headline.main: 2 South African Universities Suspend Classes Over Protests
headline.print_headline: 2 South African Universities Suspend Classes Over Protests

docs.snippet: People protesting the construction of a giant telescope on a Hawaiian mountain they hold sacred are decrying the destruction of a stone altar they built near the construction site....
docs.lead_paragraph: People protesting the construction of a giant telescope on a Hawaiian mountain they hold sacred are decrying the destruction of a stone altar they built near the construction site.

headline.main: Mauna Kea Telescope Protesters Say Stone Altar Was Destroyed
headline.print_headline: Mauna Kea Telescope Protesters Say Stone Altar Was Destroyed

docs.snippet: Abuse is bad enough. But when it goes unrecognized, things get worse....
docs.abstract: Abuse is bad enough. But when it goes unrecognized, things get worse.

docs.snippet: Hungary sealed off its border with Serbia with massive coils of barbed wire Tuesday and began detaining migrants trying to use the country as a gateway to Western Europe, harsh new measures that left thousands of frustrated asylum-seekers piled up...
docs.lead_paragraph: Hungary sealed off its border with Serbia with massive coils of barbed wire Tuesday and began detaining migrants trying to use the country as a gateway to Western Europe, harsh new measures that left thousands of frustrated asylum-seekers piled up on the Serbian side of the border.

headline.main: Hungary Declares Emergency, Seals Border, Detains Migrants
headline.print_headline: Hungary Declares Emergency, Seals Border, Detains Migrants
